title: Password Policy Enforcement
description: An analyst must configure the domain controller to enforce a new, stronger password policy.

tasks.description: Retrieve the new approved password policy from the GRC tool (e.g., minimum 14 characters, complexity required).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst has the correct policy parameters.

tasks.description: Configure a new Group Policy Object (GPO) in Active Directory with the updated password policy settings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully creates the GPO with the correct settings.

tasks.description: Apply the new GPO to all users and force a password reset for all users at their next login.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new policy is successfully enforced across the enterprise.
